resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/44698</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>44698</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_532</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_532</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ortocentro y circuncentro</string>
            <string language="en">Orthocentre and circumcentre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Orthocentre und circumcentre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Orthocentre et circumcentre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Orthocentre e circumcentre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orthocentre e circumcentre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Orthocentre και circumcentre</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de ortocentro de un triángulo. Se muestra la forma de construirlo geométricamente y la manera de calcular sus coordenadas, conocidas las coordenadas de los vértices del triángulo.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of orthocentre of a triangle. It shows how to construct it geometrically and how to calculate their coordinates, given the coordinates of the vertices of the triangle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ortocentro</string>
            <string language="en">orthocentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">altura</string>
            <string language="en">altitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">coordenadas</string>
            <string language="en">coordinates</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept von orthocentre eines Dreiecks zu erklären.
Es zeigt, wie man es geometrisch konstruiert und wie man ihre 
Koordinaten errechnet, die Koordinaten der Gipfel des Dreiecks 
gegeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de l'orthocentre d'une triangle. 
Elle montre comment la construire géométriquement et comment 
calculer leurs coordonnées, données les coordonnées des sommets de 
la triangle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito do orthocentre de um triângulo. Mostra como 
construi-lo geomètrica e como calcular suas coordenadas, dadas as 
coordenadas dos vertices do triângulo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto di orthocentre di un triangolo. Mostra come
costruirlo geometricamente e come calcolare le loro coordinate, date 
le coordinate dei vertici del triangolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια του orthocentre ενός τριγώνου. 
Επιδεικνύει πώς να το κατασκευάσει γεωμετρικά και πώς να 
υπολογίσει τις συντεταγμένες τους, λαμβάνοντας υπόψη τις 
συντεταγμένες vertices του τριγώνου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">orthocentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Höhe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Koordinaten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">orthocentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">altitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">coordonnées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">triângulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">orthocentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">altura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">coordenadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">triangolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">orthocentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">altezza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">coordinate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρίγωνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">orthocentre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύψος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντεταγμένες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
